scripts.build: pnpm run clean && astro check && astro build --prerender
scripts.preview: pnpm run optimize:full && wrangler pages dev
scripts.deploy: pnpm run optimize:full && wrangler pages deploy && pnpm run github
scripts.github: git add . && git commit -m "Deploy: $(date +'%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')" && git push origin HEAD
scripts.optimize:full: pnpm run optimize:images && pnpm run build && pnpm run optimize:preloads
